references: Related: CF 274008. Amending: Ord 78444, Ord 79798. Repealing: Ord 69816.
summary: AN ORDINANCE amending Section 6 of Ordinance 78444 relating to the City Employees' Retirement System to provide for allowance of time in active military or naval service as creditable service under said system, and repealing Section 2 of Ordinance 69816.
